Text:
I was looking for a book to ease me (a beginner) into Blender and 3D in general. This looks like it'll do more than just fine.
Thanks uploader! Will definitely seed.

Thanks a ton.  I've been looking for a good book on the 2.5 version of Blender - there's a TON of stuff for the 2.4 generation....but that version was bypassed over a year ago now!

So this is a big help for me.  Thanks again!  (And I love the searchable text, especially.)
